name: Gymkhana
description: A proper sit-down restaurant on campus serving authentic main courses and specialty cuisines.

name: North Square
description: Popular campus food court featuring a variety of quick-service fast food stalls.

name: Gazebo
description: An open-air multi-cuisine food hub with five distinct sections offering global flavors.

name: Aavin
description: The go-to spot for dairy treats, offering cold beverages and milk-based snacks.

name: Domino's
description: Classic international pizza chain located conveniently on campus.

name: AB1
description: Academic Block 1 - Home to CSE and IT departments with advanced computer labs.

name: AB2
description: Academic Block 2 - Primarily houses Electronics (SENSE) and Electrical (SELECT) schools.

name: AB3
description: Academic Block 3 - Mechanical and Civil engineering wings with specialized workshops.

name: AB4
description: Academic Block 4 - One of the newer blocks featuring modern classrooms and smart labs.

name: AB5
description: Academic Block 5 - Dedicated research labs and multipurpose academic halls.

name: Sigma
description: Sigma Block - The newest expansion for the growing student population.

name: Library
description: Central Library - A vast collection of books, journals, and digital resources with quiet zones.

name: Admin Block
description: The administrative heart of the campus for fees, registrar, and official documentation.

name: Reception
description: Information center for visitors and parents near the main gate.

name: Health Center
description: 24/7 medical assistance for students and faculty on campus.

name: Clock Court
description: Iconic meeting spot at the center of the campus under the giant clock tower.

name: Amphitheater
description: Open-air theater used for cultural events, fests, and student gatherings.

name: MG AUditorium
description: Open-air theater used for cultural events, fests, and student gatherings.

name: Concert Ground
description: Open-air theater used for cultural events, fests, and student gatherings.

name: Hostel Block A
description: One of the primary residential blocks at VIT Chennai, Hostel Block A houses male students and offers a comfortable living environment with essential amenities and easy access to campus facilities.

name: Hostel Block B
description: Hostel Block B serves as a dedicated residential space for female students at VIT Chennai, providing a safe, structured, and community-oriented living experience within the campus.

name: Hostel Block C
description: Hostel Block C is a uniquely structured residential building at VIT Chennai that accommodates both male and female students, with clearly designated sections to ensure privacy and comfort.

name: Hostel Block D1
description: A residential block at VIT Chennai Campus. Hostel Block D1 houses the freshmen male students and offers a comfortable living environment with essential amenities and easy access to campus facilities.

name: Hostel Block D2
description: A residential block at VIT Chennai, Hostel Block D2 houses second year male students and offers a comfortable living environment with essential amenities and easy access to campus facilities.

name: Hostel Block E
description: The newest residential block at VIT Chennai, Hostel Block E is for housing male student guests during events and annual festivals that the university hosts.

name: VIT Running Ground
description: Open athletics and jogging ground used for daily practice, sports training, and university events.

name: Tennis Court
description: Well-maintained tennis courts used for student practice sessions and inter-college tournaments.

name: Handball Court
description: Dedicated handball court for training sessions and university-level competitions.

name: Basketball Court
description: Outdoor basketball court frequently used for practice games and student tournaments.

name: Volleyball Court 1
description: Open volleyball court used for recreational play and university competitions.

name: Volleyball Court 2
description: Open volleyball court used for recreational play and university competitions.

name: Cricket Ground
description: Large cricket ground used for practice sessions, inter-college matches, and annual sports events.
